diseases.remedy: Rest, hygiene; diluted honey as mild salve
diseases.method: Avoid rubbing; rest; apply a very small, diluted amount of natural honey as a salve if needed
diseases.dose: A tiny drop or thin smear; conservative use advised
diseases.timing: Once or twice daily until healed; primary treatment is rest and avoidance of aggravation
diseases.source: Natural Healing with the Medicine of the Prophet — Treatment of Ophthalmia. Also referenced in Tib-e-Nabvi.
diseases.remedy_description: Honey is a golden, viscous liquid produced by bees with a sweet floral taste and sticky texture; diluted honey can be used as a mild topical salve. More images: https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:Honey

diseases.disease: Eye irritation from systemic humoral imbalance
diseases.method: Adjust diet, abstain from irritants, rest eyes and body
diseases.source: Natural Healing with the Medicine of the Prophet — Ophthalmia discussion
diseases.remedy_description: A balanced diet includes a variety of grains, fruits, vegetables and proteins; visually it appears colorful and varied, promoting general health. More images: https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:Healthy_food
